basics.name: Craig Kahle
basics.label: Cloud Solutions / Web Engineer
basics.summary: Solutions Architect / Cloud Engineer with a broad skillset focused on infrastructure automation, simplicity and using the right tool for the job

keywords: GCP Certified Professional Cloud Architect - Issued September 2021
skills.name: Certifications

work.summary: Design and implement customer architectures in a pre-sales capacity
highlights: Closed two commits in the Central region valued at $17M / 3 years, and $3M / 3 years
Lead advanced technical discovery to uncover ideal POCs
Demonstrate the value propsition of Google Cloud and its products to executives and decision makers
Manage Partner ISV developers and contribute integration code when needed
Prepared customer support traning material for customers and internally

work.summary: Troubleshot Issues and Assist Advanced / Preimum GCP Customers
highlights: Support S&P 500 Select and Premium Customers across numerous verticals
Maintain playbooks and library of 60+ PLX/SQL queries to join data to trace customer requests
Contributed to an On-Prem -> GCS Data migration PSO tool
Developed internal extension that auto saves complex customer responses in Salesforce used by ~300+

work.summary: Tasked with building Payment integrations, writing Ansible scripts, and everything in between
highlights: Built numerous systems from scratch with Ruby on Rails and Vanilla ES6/React.
Implemented Chase Paymentech tokenization front and backend in https://cart.sxsw.com that processes $40+ million annually
Provisioned and managed AWS Ubuntu 16.04 VMs with Ansible.
Built and maintained APIs used by ~200.000 attendees using the official mobile app by writing performant custom SQL/SQL views

work.summary: Full Stack Developer focusing on Web and Mobile Applications
highlights: Built custom web apps on top of the Laravel framework in PHP and Angular JS.
Built a cross platform user forum mobile app on the Ionic framework in Angular 1.x that commmunicated with a Discourse (Rails) backend.
Contributed to a complete front end rebuild of Gymboree's monolithic e-commerce platform in Angular.

work.summary: Front End Developer focused on large scale CMS rollout and temaplating
highlights: Wrote custom templates and contact management systems in PHP on top of the Joomla Framework
Used JS/JQuery and Sass to build systems that were used in 15+ departmental sites within the College of Natural Sciences
Built a mobile first SASS framework upon which all departmental sites were based

interests.name: Building Desktops (Linux/Windows/hackintosh once upon a time)
